name: Chicken Stock
recipeInstructions: 1. Put chicken in a large saucepan and cover with 2.5 l cold water.
2. Bring to the boil on a high heat, then immediately lower to a simmer.
3. After 5 minutes skim and add the other ingredients.
4. Cook gently for 1 1/2 hours without boiling, skimming when necessary.
5. Strain and cool as quickly as possible.
